name: Slots Time at World Class Casino
name_original: Slots Time at World Class Casino
description:
Any time is Slots Time, now on your Apple Watch, with FREE casino slot machines by the creators of the authentic PC & Mac casino slots from IGT, WMS Gaming, and Bally!

Play 5 casino-style slot machines complete with classic reel themes, bonus features like a Double Jackpot Multiplier, wild symbols, free spins, and single-line & multi-line action! Line up lucky 7s, classic Bars & Diamonds, and more to achieve Big Wins; and keep coming back to earn FREE coin awards from Scratch Tickets... so you can play Slots Time any time!

Enjoy immediate access to every machine:

IN THE BLACK™
JAVA BUZZ™
PATRIOT PRIDE™
OIL BARON™
POLAR PAYOUT™
